title: name 'StochasticFunction' is not defined
body_html:
Getting this error:
File torch/autograd/variable.py", line 209, in reinforce
if not isinstance(self.grad_fn, StochasticFunction):
NameError: name 'StochasticFunction' is not defined

The issue seems introduced by this commit:
d9b89a3#diff-aaab4dd580a0c7e992b97c4649b21d9f

body:
Getting this error:
 File torch/autograd/variable.py", line 209, in reinforce
    if not isinstance(self.grad_fn, StochasticFunction):
NameError: name 'StochasticFunction' is not defined

The issue seems introduced by this commit:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/d9b89a352c4ceeff24878f4f5321e16f059e98c3#diff-aaab4dd580a0c7e992b97c4649b21d9f
